schema.description:
用户组名称。

长度为1~64个字符，可包含英文字母、数字、英文句点（.）、下划线（_）和短划线（-）。

备注信息。

最大长度128个字符。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "Group": {
    "GroupId": "g-FpMEHiMysofp****",
    "GroupName": "Dev-Team",
    "Comments": "开发团队",
    "CreateDate": "2015-01-23T12:33:18Z"
  },
  "RequestId": "D3F0679E-9757-95DB-AF2D-04D5188C69C5"
}","errorExample":"{
    "RequestId": "D3F0679E-9757-95DB-AF2D-04D5188C69C5",
    "Group": {
        "GroupName": "Dev-Team",
        "Comments": "开发团队",
        "CreateDate": "2015-01-23T12:33:18Z"
    }
}"},{"type":"xml","example":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<CreateGroupResponse>
	<RequestId>D3F0679E-9757-95DB-AF2D-04D5188C69C5</RequestId>
	<Group>
		<GroupName>Dev-Team</GroupName>
		<Comments>开发团队</Comments>
		<CreateDate>2015-01-23T12:33:18Z</CreateDate>
        <GroupId>g-FpMEHiMysofp****</GroupId>
	</Group>
</CreateGroupResponse>","errorExample":"<CreateGroupResponse>
    <RequestId>D3F0679E-9757-95DB-AF2D-04D5188C69C5</RequestId>
    <Group>
        <GroupName>Dev-Team</GroupName>
        <Comments>开发团队</Comments>
        <CreateDate>2015-01-23T12:33:18Z</CreateDate>
    </Group>
</CreateGroupResponse>"}]
title: 创建用户组
